code: import{useState}from'react';var url='https://api.pokemontcg.io/v1/cards';export function listing(value){var response=fetch(value?"".concat(url,"?name=").concat(value):url).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Error');}console.log('list');return response.json();});return response;};export function getDetails(id){var response=fetch("".concat(url,"/").concat(id)).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Error');}console.log('details');return response.json();});return response;};
